title: How to Dance a Cha-Cha Spot Turn | Cha-Cha Dance

json.text: Aaron: From Dance Times Square, here in New York City. Today, we're going to be talking
about the cha-cha spot turns. So we're going to start this, again with our left foot, and
we're going to move into our basic action. One, two, three, cha-cha one.
Now instead of a break forward on our left foot, Christina and I are going to take our
left foot and step directly to our right. Forward, pivot, forward, turning the face
to front again, cha-cha one. Now repeating that same action with our right foot. Forward,
pivot, forward, side, together, side, two, three, side, together, side, two, three, side,
And that's how you do the cha-cha spot turn. Now let's try that with a partner. And one,
two, three, side, together, side, two, three, side together, side, two, three, side together,
side, two, three, side together, side. One, two, three, cha-cha one, two, three, cha-cha
one, two, three, cha-cha one, two, three, cha-cha one. Now let's try that with music.
